Klasse VulkanTools

java.lang.Object
Kartoffel.Licht.Vulkan.VulkanTools
public class VulkanTools extends Object
Class for creating Vulkan Objects and doing stuff with them.

      public static ByteBuffer mapMemory(org.lwjgl.vulkan.VkDevice device, Allocator.Memory memory, long offset, long size)

    • transitionImageLayout

      public static void transitionImageLayout(Image image, int format, int oldLayout, int newLayout, long commandPool, org.lwjgl.vulkan.VkQueue queue, int srcAccessMask, int dstAccessMask, int sourceStage, int destinationStage)
      Transitions the Image Layout.
      Parameter:
      image - the image
      format - the format
      oldLayout - the old layout
      newLayout - the new layout
      commandPool - the commandPool
      queue - the queue
      srcAccessMask - the source access Mask
      dstAccessMask - the destination access Mask
      sourceStage - the source Stage
      destinationStage - the destination Stage

    • unmapMemory

      public static void unmapMemory(org.lwjgl.vulkan.VkDevice device, Allocator.Memory memory)
      Unmaps some memory. The ByteBuffer created using unmapMemory(VkDevice, Memory) will be invalidated
      Parameter:
      device - -
      memory - -
